text: We are using a custom FTP application (which encrypts the files) for secure transfers.
We send the application to end users and they use it to send us confidential data.
We also use it to send information back to the end users.
The application is in need of an update - some things are no longer working consistently.
As the end users get more restrictive security environments, as OS updates are released, etc.
Some of features which would be nice:
